import React, { useState } from 'react'; import '../../Styles/Sidebar.css'; import AppLogo from '../../Images/app-logo.png'; const Sidebar = (props) => { const [activeNavlink, setActiveNavlink] = useState('Dashboard'); const handleClick = (activeElementName) => { setActiveNavlink(activeElementName); props.sidebarDetails.toggleSidebar(); }; return (
  • handleClick('Dashboard')}> Dashboard
  • handleClick('Completed')}> Completed
  • handleClick('Upcoming')}> Upcoming
) }; export default Sidebar;
